application.title: Feedback
application.text: A single window to submit projects and proposals for cooperation with MoDoU will be available here soon

bottom-apply.ask-question-text: For defence industry enterprises, developers, investors: contact the Accelerator if you have questions, proposals for reforms, or if there are problems in cooperation with the Ministry of Defence.
bottom-apply.join-text: We invite to Accelerator all experienced specialists (both mobilized and civilian) in management, analytics, mil-tech techonologies and other talents with developed soft skills.

article-info.title: Deputy Minister of Defenсe of Ukraine
article-info.text: Unique innovative ideas designed to strengthen the Ukrainian Defenсe Forces are often lost in the bureaucracy. The reality requires accelerated implementation of defenсe innovations to achieve technological superiority over the enemy. Given the challenges of today, the Ministry of Defenсe decided to launch an Accelerator similar to those in the ministries of defenсe of allied countries.
